derivation: third person singular present indicative of G1510 (ἐστί);
kjv_def: are, be(-long), call, X can(-not), come, consisteth, X dure for a while, + follow, X have, (that) is (to say), make, meaneth, X must needs, + profit, + remaineth, + wrestle
strongs_def: he (she or it) is; also (with neuter plural) they are
outline: 1. "he/she/it is" (third person singular of 'to be')Used with 3739 in the following verses: Mar 3:17; 7:11, 34; 12:42; 15:15; Eph 6:17; Col 1:24; Hbr 7:2; Rev 21:8, 17. These are listed under number 3603.
